controllers.name: controllers
controllers.description: Include all plugin's controllers to handle HTTP or socket messages.

manageables.name: manageables
manageables.description: Manageables are elements with an history and a planning.

BrowserSocketController.name: BrowserSocketController
BrowserSocketController.description: Defines a BrowserSocketController to Handle messages sent by browsers through socket namespace.

Cache.name: Cache
Cache.description: Defines a memory cache for manageables.

Device.name: Device
Device.description:
Defines a Device.

A Device is a Manageable structure holding information about a device.

props.name: history
props.description: The list of history events related to the device

props.name: history
props.description: The list of history events related to the group

Manageable.name: Manageable
Manageable.description: Defines a Manageable which is an element with an history and a planning.

props.name: history
props.description: The list of history events related to the manageable

DeviceProvider.name: DeviceProvider
DeviceProvider.description: Defines a DeviceProvider to interact with storage to manage devices' entities.

params.name: storage
params.description: The storage to use to store provider entities

GroupProvider.name: GroupProvider
GroupProvider.description: Defines a GroupProvider to interact with storage to manage groups' entities.

params.name: storage
params.description: The storage to use to store provider entities

ManageableProvider.name: ManageableProvider
ManageableProvider.description: Defines a ManageableProvider for entities with an history and a planning.

params.name: location
params.description: The location of the manageables in the storage

BrowserPilot.name: BrowserPilot
BrowserPilot.description:
Defines Browser's pilot.

A BrowserPilot interacts with browsers.
It emits events received by the browsers and offers methods to control the browsers.

Manager.name: Manager
Manager.description:
Orchestrates devices and browsers to keep them live-synchronized.

Use Manager.get() to get an instance of the Manager.

params.name: devicesPilot
params.description: Devices' pilot to interact with devices

params.name: browsersPilot
params.description: Browsers' pilot to interact with browsers

params.name: scheduleManager
params.description: A schedule manager to add / remove schedule jobs

ScheduleManager.name: ScheduleManager
ScheduleManager.description:
Manages process dependent scheduled jobs, for session recording, using
node-shedule (https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-schedule).

Recording a job is process dependent, meaning that jobs have to be recreated if process
is restarted.

BROWSERS_MESSAGES.name: BROWSERS_MESSAGES
BROWSERS_MESSAGES.description: Defines the list of socket messages sent by browsers.

classitems.description:
Checks if a schedule is not in collision with schedules of a group.

Device schedule should not be in collision with group's schedules.

return.description:
true if the schedule is not in collision with other schedules
false otherwise

classitems.description: Checks if a schedule is actually running.
classitems.name: isScheduleRunning

props.name: beginDate
props.description: The begin date of the schedule

props.name: recurrent
props.description: true if this is a daily schedule, false otherwise

props.name: endDate
props.description: The end date of the daily schedule (required if recurrent is set to true)

return.description: true if the schedule is running, false otherwise

classitems.description:
Checks if a schedule has expired.

Schedule is considered expired if one of the following condition is filled :
  - Schedule is not recurrent and schedule has finished
  - Schedule is recurrent and this is the end date and day schedule has finished
classitems.name: isScheduleExpired

props.name: beginDate
props.description: The begin date of the schedule

props.name: recurrent
props.description: true if this is a daily schedule, false otherwise

props.name: endDate
props.description: The end date of the daily schedule (required if recurrent is set to true)

return.description: true if the schedule has expired, false otherwise

The list of devices to store with for each device:

  - **String** [name] The device name
  - **String** [state] The device default state

params.description:
The function to call when it's done

  - **Number** The total amount of devices inserted
  - **Array** The list of added devices

classitems.description:
Manage public router.

It will be automatically mounted on /manage/ by the core.
classitems.name: router

classitems.description:
Manage private router.

All routes associated to the private router require a back end authentication.
It will be automatically mounted on /be/manage/ by the core.
classitems.name: privateRouter

classitems.description:
Manage web service router.

All routes associated to the Web Service router will require a Web Service authentication.
It will be automatically mounted on /manage/ by the core (but on another server).
classitems.name: webServiceRouter

classitems.description:
Prepares plugin by creating required database indexes.

Optional "init" method automatically called by core application
after plugin is loaded and before it is started.
classitems.name: init

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise

classitems.description:
Creates a manager to handle groups and devices through socket namespaces.

Browsers (back end interfaces) are live-synchronized with connected devices.

Optional "start" method automatically called by core application
after plugin is loaded and initialized.
classitems.name: start

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise

Builds an history message.

Historic are composed of a date, a message as a translation key
and parameters for the translation key.

Saves the historic in database and cache then informs browsers about
the new historic.

 - **Error** An error is something went wrong

classitems.description:
Adds an historic to device's history.

Use modifier *addToGroup* to also add the historic into history of device's group.
Saves the history in database and cache then informs browsers about
the new historic.

params.description: true to also add the historic to the history of the device's group

classitems.description:
Starts manager.

When started the manager starts receiving events from
both devices and browsers. It also populates cache with all registered
devices and groups.

All expired schedules' jobs of devices and groups are removed. Other schedules
are registered.
classitems.name: start

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise

params.name: date
params.description: The date to execute the job

params.name: isDaily
params.description: true if the job must be daily, false otherwise

params.name: functionToExecute
params.description: The function to execute at the specified date

return.description: The job id
